name: Terrific 3D Color Puzzle
description:
The level changes based on your color, find color gates to change. Cubes with color require you to match the color, and can't be taken through a gate of a different color, or they will be destroyed.

Gather 3 coins (Bronze, Silver, and Gold) on your way to the level finish (a black hole)

There is also a slightly hidden easter egg that can be found.
